section.5: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Abu Musa reported on the authority of his father that an Inquirer came to the Prophet (ï·º) and asked him about the times of prayers, and the rest of the hadith is the same (as narrated above) but for these words:" On the second day he (the Holy Prophet) observed the evening prayer before the disappearance of the twilight
